disambiguation.description: The user wants to improve their chat prompt to get better AI responses
examples: How can I improve this prompt?
Help me write a better prompt

enumDescriptions: General improvement - Balanced approach for any coding prompt
Context-aware - Uses workspace context internally to provide specific, detailed improvements based on your actual codebase (files, classes, functions, patterns)
Concise - Quick improvements with minimal overhead
Custom - Use only your custom instructions (no preset)
promptImprover.systemPromptPreset.description: Choose a preset system prompt or use 'custom' for your own instructions. Changes take effect immediately.

promptImprover.systemPrompt.markdownDescription:
**Current Active System Prompt** - Automatically updates when you change the preset above.

**To customize:** Use 'Additional Custom Instructions' below (won't be overwritten by preset changes).

**Placeholders:** `{userPrompt}`, `{languages}`, `{technologies}`, `{openFiles}`

promptImprover.customSystemPrompt.markdownDescription:
**Additional Custom Instructions** - Add your own instructions combined with the preset.

**Presets mode:** Your instructions are appended to the preset  
**Custom mode:** Only your instructions are used

**Placeholders:** `{userPrompt}`, `{languages}`, `{technologies}`, `{openFiles}`

promptImprover.modelFamily.markdownDescription:
**Model Selection:** Specify which model to use for prompt improvement, or leave empty to use the current chat model.

**Leave empty** (recommended): Uses whatever model you have selected in Copilot Chat (falls back to gpt-4o-mini if no model is selected)  
**Specify a model**: Always use a specific model (e.g., `gpt-4o`, `claude-sonnet-4`, `gemini-2.5-pro`)

**Default fallback**: gpt-4o-mini (fastest, free with Copilot subscription)

**Commands:**  
[Select Model](command:prompt-improver.selectModel) | [List Available Models](command:prompt-improver.listAvailableModels)

enumDescriptions: Minimal - Only basic workspace metadata (languages, technologies, open files)
Auto - Smart context based on preset (minimal for general/concise, rich for context-aware)
Rich - Always include full context (conversation history, markdown files, all available context)
promptImprover.contextRichness.markdownDescription:
Control how much context is gathered and included in prompt improvements.

**Minimal:** Fast, basic metadata only  
**Auto:** Smart defaults based on your preset choice  
**Rich:** Maximum context for best results (may be slower)
